title: Serbia v England: World Cup 2026 qualifying Group K – live
summary: Thomas Tuchel's team aims to continue their perfect record in Group K. Rob Smyth provides a minute-by-minute report on the match. Fans are eager to see if they can secure another victory.

title: Trump spokesperson calls strike on Qatar ‘unfortunate’ after Israel targets Hamas leaders in Doha – live updates
summary: Trump's press secretary stated that the attack on Hamas leaders does not further Israel or America's objectives. She characterized Qatar as a strong ally and friend of the United States. The remarks highlight the complex dynamics in U.S. foreign policy in the Middle East.

title: White House denies that Trump wrote Epstein letter and calls investigation a Democrat ‘hoax’ – live
summary: The White House press secretary has refuted claims that President Biden sent convicted sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein a card featuring an outline of a woman's body for his 50th birthday. The statement was made in response to recent allegations circulating in the media. The press secretary emphasized the inaccuracy of these claims.

title: Starmer condemns Israel airstrike on Qatar as No 10 denies prior knowledge of attack
summary: The Prime Minister stated that an immediate ceasefire, the release of hostages, and a significant increase in aid to Gaza are essential for achieving peace. This statement emphasizes the need for urgent humanitarian interventions amid ongoing conflict. The call reflects a focused approach to address the crisis and facilitate stability in the region.

title: Brazil: first judge in Jair Bolsonaro coup plot trial votes to convict
summary: Four additional Supreme Court justices are set to cast their votes soon, with a final verdict anticipated by Thursday or Friday. The decision will conclude ongoing deliberations among the justices. The outcome remains closely watched.
